ingredients.ingredient: 3 tablespoons basil chiffonade (thinly sliced fresh basil leaves), divided
1 (4 ounce) log of fresh goat cheese, halved
16 cherry tomatoes, cut in half on the diagonal
freshly ground black pepper to taste
1 pinch cayenne pepper, or to taste

cookingTips: Bake goat cheese just until softened but still holding shape
Use the best quality tomatoes available for maximum flavor impact
enrichment.coachingPrompt: What temperature creates creamy goat cheese without melting it completely, and how long does this take?
